title: OpKit Patchbay
description: A modular, node-based engineering platform for AV professionals. Connect tools, analyse signals, and generate calibration assets in a unified visual workflow.
longDescription: OpKit Patchbay is a visual patchbay for the web, allowing users to chain together functional nodes into custom workflows.

layout.content:
### Key Features

*  Node-Based Workflow: Drag-and-drop interface to connect tools dynamically.
*  Signal Generation: Create custom QR slates, projection grids, and calibration templates.
*  Professional Analysis: Tools for pixel density (PPI/Pitch), viewing distance calculations, and blend region visualization.
*  Live Output: Real-time rendering of test patterns and templates for on-site system verification and real-world feature identification using the systems video outputs.

Itâ€™s currently in BETA, with an aim to develop further over time and productise workflow and creation for immersive productions.
